Headline: 95th-bound Red Line Service Delayed near Thorndale
ShortDescription: 95th-bound Red Line trains are standing near Thorndale due to a mechanical problem on a train. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
95th-bound Red Line trains are standing near Thorndale due to a mechanical problem on a train. 

 Shuttle buses are available between Howard and Bryn Mawr to provide connecting service.

 At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as #151 Sheridan, #22 Clark, #147 Outer, #36 Broadway, or using buses to other rail lines.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
